import React from 'react' import "./featured.scss" import PlayArrowIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PlayArrow'; import InfoOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/InfoOutlined'; export default function Featured({type}) { return (
{type && (
{type === 'movie' ? 'Movies' : 'Series'}
)}
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, adipisci consequatur qui iusto harum obcaecati. Odit possimus laborum quas architecto, cumque explicabo quod non, omnis suscipit deleniti rerum necessitatibus iusto.
) }
